featured.text: These nets are recognized by medical experts as the best hope for __(22)__ the spread of malaria－Cambodia’s most deadly disease.
The aim of the campaign is to remind people of the damage the deadly weed does to their body.
All the time that we spend rooted in the chair is linked to increased risks of so many deadly diseases that experts have named this modern-day health epidemic the “sitting disease.”

definition.en_def: Causing or capable of causing death.
definition.example: The snake's venom is deadly and can kill within minutes.
